title: Elvis Presley - Chicago double strike (2012)
description:
Title:  Chicago Double-Strike   
  Label:  Straight Arrow   
  Label Number:  SA/SP 2012-12-02   
  Release Date:  2012   
  Recording Type:  Live Audience Recording   
  Location:  Chicago / Illinois, Chicago Stadium   
  Date:  May 1 - 1977, Evening Show & May 2 - 1977, Evening Show    
  Sound:  Very Good!   
          
  Track Listing:   
  May 1, 1977:         
01 Also Sprach Zarathustra.      01:12 
02 See See Rider / When The Saints Go Marching In (excerpt)      04:52 
03 I Got A Woman / Amen      07:38

11 Teddy Bear / Don't Be Cruel      02:18 
12 And I Love You So      03:38

17 Johnny B. Goode      00:53 
18 Drum Solo (Ronnie Tutt)       02:01 
19 Bass Solo (Jerry Scheff)       00:56 
20 Piano Solo (Tony Brown)       01:07 
21 Electric Piano Solo (Bobby Ogdin)       01:36 
22 School Days      00:59

24 Introduction of Joe Esposito      00:23 
25 Hound Dog      01:26

01 Also Sprach Zarathustra      01:10

09 Little Sister      01:57 
10 Teddy Bear / Don't Be Cruel      02:25 
11 My Way      03:56

13 Introduction of vocalists, musicians       03:37 
14 Early Mornin' Rain      01:57 
15 What'd I Say      00:57 
16 Johnny B. Goode      00:58 
17 Drum Solo (Ronnie Tutt)      02:24 
18 Bass Solo (Jerry Scheff)       01:46 
19 Piano Solo (Tony Brown)      01:25 
20 Electric Piano Solo (Bobby Ogdin)      01:39 
21 School Days      00:57

Notes:   Comes in a double digipak. The sound is slightly better as on the Rockin' Chicago releases.
